thread.section_title: Hotel Traiano - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great stay!
thread.title_full: Great stay! - Review of Hotel Traiano, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Caroline D
title: Great stay!
text: This quaint hotel is centrally located and close to every main tourist attraction. The rooms are beautiful and very clean. Staff is friendly and speak fairly good English. Free breakfast in the morning is decent...it is included with your room rate though so I didn't expect much. For being steps away from the Trevi Fountain and a 10 minute walk from the Spanish Steps...I would highly recommend this hotel for a weekend getaway!
